oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The need for safety in the decision-making process of customers of organic food stores
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fürediné Kovács, Annamária
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Food safety ensures the maintenance and long-term preservation of health. The results of my research (n=697) show that the customers of organic shops expect the technological and functional features of foods to provide that safety. Those factors have a bigger impact on their product selection decisions than on that of average Hungarian consumers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Fürediné Kovács, Annamária (2006) The need for safety in the decision-making process of customers of organic food stores.
